content:
Nicholas Lefebvre is student whose interests range from Agriculture to AI. He enjoys working on projects at the interection of these two fields, which in all cases requires lots of data. Therefore on top of his studies he is actively learning how to use Python to collate, transform, process and interpret data.
Some side projects include the building and hosting of this static webpage (which is still under construction, please forgive me) to home distilling.
summary: Nicholas Lefebvre is student whose interests range from Agriculture to AI. He enjoys working on projects at the interection of these two fields, which in all cases requires lots of data.
title: Nicholas Lefebvre
